name: Web Development
text: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, ...

name: App Development
text: Organized and easy to understand app building tutorials with lots of examples like xml,Python, Java, c++, unity, android studio etc...

name: Devops
text: Infrastructure automation (like Puppet, Chef, Ansible), Container concepts (LXD, Docker)
